StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Having 1.9 Years of Experience as a Software Engineer in the IT industry. Hands on experience in Core Java. Hands on experience in Spring Boot. Hands on experience in Spring Data JPA.

PositionHistory.Title: Associate Java Developer
PositionHistory.Description: Implemented Controller Classes, Exposed and consumed restful web services in Spring, Written Spring service interfaces and their implementations

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Implemented Controller Classes
PositionHistory.Description:
Duration: March 2018 to March 2019 Environment: Java, Spring boot, Spring batch, Spring Data JPA, Eclipse and DB2, MYSQL
Description: It is an insurance project (batch application) that verifies the annual mileage of vehicle for the insurer, agent and company. The platform functions as a "Physical to Digital" Transformation layer by keeping digital information about different physical objects in the world. Responsibilities:
Implemented Controller Classes. Consumed Restful and SOAP web services with spring boot. Implemented Commands and their validations. Written Spring Service Interfaces and their implementations. Written Spring DAO's and their implementations with Spring data JPA. Written reader, processor and writer.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 82% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computers) from Asansol Engineering College (AEC) in 2016

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Key Skills: Associate Software Engineer, Software Developer, Software Development, Application Programming, Application Maintenance, Project Management, Requirement Analysis, Solution Architecture, Core Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Maven, Postman, Restful Web Services
